mapper.sql: id, user_id,name,process, status,start_time,end_time, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, is_deleted
mapper.insert: insert into task (id, name,process, status,start_time,end_time, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, is_deleted) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{process,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT})

insert into task
id,
user_id,
name,
process,
status,
start_time,
end_time,
create_time,
create_by,
update_time,
update_by,
is_deleted,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{process,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

#{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},

mapper.update:
update task
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
process = #{process,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from task where 1=1
and name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and user_id = #{userId} or user_id = -88
order by create_time desc limit #{start} , #{pageSize}

select count(1) from task where 1=1
and name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and user_id = #{userId} or user_id = -88
